Title: Adan King Size Bed in Brown Colour

Details.Dimensions:: H 45.4 x W 108 x D 82; Seating height - 15; Mattress Size-72x78 (Not included)(All dimensions in inches)

Description: Casacraft offers the best in comfort with elan. The collections are a series of modern trendy designs, simple yet striking and represent the ideals of minimalism. The designs are a perfect blend of functionality and exceptional aesthetics. Each piece is crafted with passion and follows international standards on quality and style. Modern is a distinct, defined style which originated in the early 1900s. It uses a combination of vinyl, steel, plastic, glass or wood having monochromatic colors and sleek silhouettes. Modern furniture lives at the intersection of clean lines and relaxed comfort accentuating form and function.
